channel.title: Podcast on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 20
item.description: This week is a short one, I don’t have much to say and also spent most of the week without internet (third world’s nice AMIRITE). [podcast] #620: How to Deal With Life’s Regrets A podcast discussing the concept of counterfactual thinking, what it is, how it affects our lives and some other things related to it. [blog-post] Politics matters most to slaves. In this post Luke Smith explains why he usually doesn’t talk about politics in his youtube channel or in his website.

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 13
item.description: This week was the definition of dead. Here is the only thing worth sharing that I saw this week and the corresponding music recommendation. [podcast] Private Suite Podcast : Vapor Memory Interview This was an incredible find, I didn’t know there was a podcast dedicated to vaporwave until Vapor Memory uploaded this interview on his channel. Being the go-to channel to discover vaporwave on youtube, Vapor Memory is a very well known name in the vaporwave community, a name I would say as well known as some of the older and well established vaporwave artists.

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 12
item.description: This week I played Hellblade: Senua’s sacrifice, I was interested in this game because it’s an adventure seen through a schizophrenic woman’s eyes, there are visual artifacts through the game and voices, friendly and hostile, that whisper, speak and scream to you from all directions, as if they come from inside your mind, all to make you feel immersed in the experience of living as a schizophrenic. It was a short game but deeply engaging, it truly is a story that is best told through an interactive medium like videogames.
